tika.dc.description:
Kept For His Appetites (BBW, Billionaire, graphic, explicit, erotic romance, bundle)

3 hot volumes of hot BBW lust and hard rocking sex
When a handsome, mysterious and commanding billionaire bursts out of the sultry New York city heat and into a downtown diner, the big, beautiful waitress is left trembling, flushed and breathless.

Whisked onto a luxury super-yacht and into his world for the weekend, will she be kept in that world purely for his pleasure?

WARNING: This 18,000 + word compendium of stories is intended for readers 18+ ONLY. It includes graphic and explicit descriptions of numerous sex acts, involving a curvy girl, a Billionaire AND OTHERS. INCLUDING oral sex and voyeurist observation of sex.
